fields.description: Restricts the resource fields. Only the specified fields and mandatory system fields are returned.

subTypes.description: Maps discriminator values (as defined in subtypes) to query objects specific to corresponding subtypes. Subtype-specific query objects support a subset(fields,accessors,filter) of the query capabilities when compared to the base.

accessors.description: Maps accessor names to query objects specific to corresponding accessors. Query object for each accessor supports query capabilities similar to the base.

collection.description: Defines query criteria that can be applied on a resource collection.

filter.description: The resource collection will be queried using the specified filter condition.

limit.description: Restricts the number of resource items returned inside the resource collection. If the limit exceeds the resource count then the framework will only return the available resource items.

offset.description: Defines the starting position of the resource collection. If offset exceeds the resource count then no resource items are returned.

includeTotalItems.description: Specifies whether the server should estimate the total number of records for a given query and include the count in the response.

sortBy.description: Orders a resource collection based on the specified fields.

oneOf.description: Name of field based on which sorting will happen. Order is ascending.
Object with single entry. Key must be name of field based on which sorting will happen. Value must be either asc or desc to decide the sort order.

privilege.description: Represents the privilege or action required to check for while serving a request to access a resource.

parameters.description: Values to be applied in a parameterized filter specific to the view.

courseoffering_view-withDescriptions.description: Successful response of retrieving view withDescriptions for resource courseoffering

__root_query.description: Query over POST request on a root resource collection

__item_query.description: Query over POST request on a item

__collection_query.description: Query over POST request on a child resource collection

_limit.name: $limit
_limit.description: Restricts the number of resource items returned inside the resource collection. If the limit exceeds the resource count then the framework will only return the available resource items.

_offset.name: $offset
_offset.description: Defines the starting position of the resource collection. If offset exceeds the resource count then no resource items are returned.

_includeTotalItems.name: $includeTotalItems
_includeTotalItems.description: Specifies whether the server should estimate the total number of records for a given query and include the count in the response.

_filter.name: $filter
_filter.description: The resource collection will be queried using the specified filter condition.

_sortBy.name: $sortBy
_sortBy.description: Orders a resource collection based on the specified fields. The parameter value is a comma-separated string of field names, each optionally followed by a colon and "asc" (default) or "desc".

_fields.name: $fields
_fields.description: Restricts the resource fields. Only the specified fields and mandatory system fields are returned.

_effectiveDate.name: $effectiveDate
_effectiveDate.description: Effective date value in the ISO 8601 date format 'YYYY-MM-DD'. This date is required by business logic to search for effective-dated business objects.
